## usage
```bash:
Usage: pypi-info [-h] [-l] [-d] [-p PATH] [--version-download VERSION_DOWNLOAD] [--author] [--home] [--tags] [--urls] [-s] [-r]
                 [-v]
                 [package]

ğŸ PyPI Package Information Tool - Get detailed info about Python packages

Positional Arguments:
  package               ğŸ“¦ Package name or search query

Options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  -l, --last            ğŸ” Show only the latest version information
  -d, --download        ğŸ“¥ Download the package with progress bar
  -p, --path PATH       ğŸ“ Directory path to save downloaded files (default: current directory)
  --version-download VERSION_DOWNLOAD
                        ğŸ”¢ Specific version to download (default: latest)
  --author              ğŸ‘¤ Show author information
  --home                ğŸ  Show home page URL
  --tags                ğŸ·ï¸ Show package classifiers/tags
  --urls                ğŸ”— Show all project URLs
  -s, --search-only     ğŸ” Show search results only, don't fetch detailed info
  -r, --requirements    ğŸ“‹ Show package requirements/dependencies
  -v, --version         Show version
```
